slider.heading1: Calm, sun, relaxation. A holiday home to disconnect
slider.heading2: The song of the cicadas, the scent of laurels: the South within your reach
slider.heading3: Between vineyards and mountains, a cocoon in the lands of Roussillon.
slider.heading4: Natural and historical sites for the hiking enthusiasts
slider.heading5: Enjoy the authenticity of Catalan local products

homedesc.title: Welcome to La Maison à Gégé
homedesc.a: Built on one level on a living area of XX m², the Maison à Gégé is a beautiful and charming house in Cathar country located on the heights of Tautavel. Nestled comfortably in the middle of vineyards, it has a large garden with terrace and a swimming pool.
homedesc.b: It has three bedrooms, a living room, a bathroom, a shower room and a fully equipped kitchen. You will also benefit from a private parking space on site and a free Wi-Fi connection.
homedesc.c: The setting is ideal for hikers and cyclists as well as for enthusiasts of prehistory and lovers of fine wines.
